news.headline: Trump revokes landmark ruling that greenhouse gases endanger public health
news.summary: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

news.headline: T20 World Cup: How India vs Pakistan relations went from bad to worse
news.summary: From handshake row to match boycott - a look at the post-conflict controversial incidents in cricket's biggest rivalry.

news.headline: Microsoft: New Windows LNK spoofing issues aren't vulnerabilities
news.summary: Today, at Wild West Hackin' Fest, security researcher Wietze Beukema disclosed multiple vulnerabilities in Windows LK shortcut files that allow attackers to deploy malicious payloads. [...]
